interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: LUVCIRCUS 001 Professional Hair Brush-This luxury boar and nylon bristle hair brush is a meticulously crafted, premium, flat hair brush. An exceptional hairbrush for women who love gorgeous hair.
Review Date: 2021/07/06
Store: LUVCIRCUS
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'LUVCIRCUS', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'Curly,Straight,Thick', 'Material': 'Boar, Nylon', 'Product Dimensions': '9 x 4.75 x 1.5 inches; 7.55 Ounces'}
Review Text: This is a pretty brush that feels good on the scalp and brushes and distributes my natural oils nicely , but it is way over priced. Almost $50 for a brush that is average is crazy. I don't feel that is there is anything special about this brush that you can't find for $15 at Walmart.
Review Title: Too expensive
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Huxley Secret of Sahara Clay Mask Balanced Blend 4.23 fl. oz. | Korean Clay Mask to Refine Pores and Absorb Excess Oil and Sebum | Made with Moroccan Rhassoul Clay Huxley {'Brand': 'Huxley', 'Item Form': 'Clay', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Special Feature': 'Hypoallergenic', 'Unit Count': '4.23 Fl Oz', 'Product Dimensions': '2.68 x 2.68 x 6.97 inches; 6.38 Ounces'} This mask is one my favorite clay masks that I've tried. It so gentle on the skin and hardly any scent to it. It's not too thick and easily applied in a thin layer. It exfoliates well and leaves my face feeling clean and visibly brighter after the first use. I was also pleasantly surprised that my face didn't feel dry after and it actually felt moisturized. A little goes a long way and it's well worth the price. The packaging is beautiful and looks like a luxury item. This would make a great gift! Will absolutely be buying this again when this tube is finished. Visibly brightens my skin DEROL Eyeshadow Stick Sets 12 Colors，Long Lasting Glitter Eye Brightener Eyeliner Sticks,Cream to Powder Waterproof Eye Makeup,Eyeshadow Capsules Crayon,Shimmer Eye Shadow Pencils (12 Colors/Box) DEROL {'Brand': 'DEROL', 'Item Form': 'Crayon,Cream,Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Long lasting', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '2.2 x 2 x 2 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '715962598334'} I was really excited to receive these little eyeshadows. They are small and compact, which makes them easy to pack and travel with. The colors are pretty and while not super pigmented at to begin with they are buildable and blend well. I tried them with eye primer and with out and they lasted the same for me. I will say I have oily eyelids and noticed that they don't last more than a couple hours.
I think these would make a great gift for adults, teens, or even younger kids who want play makeup. My daughters who are 6 and 7 found them one day and loved using them. They especially loved the blue and purple that they said made them look like a mermaid. They are super fun and priced fairly so I would say give them a try! Compact and easy application 2Pcs Mascara Black Volume and Length 4D Natural and Long Lasting Lash Blast Mascara, 0.27 Fl Oz Marine Forest {'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Item Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Waterproof', 'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 2.01 x 0.98 inches; 3.17 Ounces', 'UPC': '729843907382'} This mascara did not work for me. I tried it with a primer and without to see how it performed and both times it flaked with in 4 hours giving me raccoon eyes. I wanted to love it though because it is very pigmented and applied smoothly without clumps. Didn't work for me, but that doesn't mean it wont for others. Pigmented but flaked Movo Matte Liquid Foundation and Makeup Sponge Set – 5 Shades Medium Coverage Lightweight Feel Liquid Foundation for Combination / Oily Skin, Flawless Natural Look with Matte Finish 1.0 oz (#3 Medium beige) Movo {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Oily', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Brand': 'Movo', 'Product Dimensions': '5.11 x 1.57 x 1 inches; 2.89 Ounces'} It gives a good light to medium coverage, but I found that I could only use a little bit because it would make my skin look cakey and dry. It applies easily with the damp beauty blender and feels lightweight. I was able to apply blush and bronzer easily. It lasted all day and didn't settle in my fine lines and gives a smooth matte finish. One thing I really like is that it didn't irritate my skin and cause a reaction like a lot of foundations do. A little goes a long way LUVCIRCUS 001 Professional Hair Brush-This luxury boar and nylon bristle hair brush is a meticulously crafted, premium, flat hair brush. An exceptional hairbrush for women who love gorgeous hair. LUVCIRCUS {'Brand': 'LUVCIRCUS', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'Curly,Straight,Thick', 'Material': 'Boar, Nylon', 'Product Dimensions': '9 x 4.75 x 1.5 inches; 7.55 Ounces'} This is a pretty brush that feels good on the scalp and brushes and distributes my natural oils nicely , but it is way over priced. Almost $50 for a brush that is average is crazy. I don't feel that is there is anything special about this brush that you can't find for $15 at Walmart. Too expensive
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Continues to favor skincare, particularly clay masks for gentle exfoliation and brightening effects, while also exploring eye makeup with a focus on vibrant options. The user has recently begun to incorporate lightweight, natural-finish foundations into their routine, ensuring compatibility with their sensitive skin.

- **Skin Type:** Sensitive skin, with a strong preference for hypoallergenic and non-irritating formulations across skincare and makeup. The user has shown caution when trying foundations suitable for oily skin to avoid irritation.

- **Key Features Valued:** Effective cleansing, moisturizing properties, and easy application remain crucial. The user appreciates versatile, buildable makeup with aesthetically pleasing packaging for gifting, while also being conscious of performance to avoid cakiness or dryness.

- **Consumer Behavior:** Demonstrates a willingness to repurchase high-quality skincare items and is gradually refining their makeup selection. The user values compact, travel-friendly products that blend fun with functionality. Recent interactions indicate a focus on overall quality, even extending to haircare products, although pricing sensitivity is evident.

- **Satisfaction Level:** Generally high satisfaction with products that align with their needs. Recent experiences reveal heightened scrutiny regarding performance to prevent flaking or irritation, aiming for effective skincare routines while enjoying safe, playful makeup solutions.

**Trends:** The user maintains a commitment to effective skincare, alongside a cautious yet evolving approach to makeup and hair products, emphasizing practicality, enjoyment, and skin sensitivity.
